name: Cargo
description: Execute a command with Cargo, the Rust package manager.
helpMarkdown: For more information about Cargo, take a look at the official [documentation](https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/)
author: Sylvain Pontoreau

inputs.name: cargoCommand
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Cargo command to execute (example: build, test, update, install, doc...)

inputs.name: cargoCommandOptions
inputs.label: Options
inputs.defaultValue: Command options (add -v to use verbose output).
